main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQueryReportCell] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDrillThroughQueryReportCell]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQueryReportCell]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDrillThroughQueryReportCell] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [tblDrillThroughQueryReportCell]( [DimensionName] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [MeasureName] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [ActionTypeCode] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [DrillThroughQueryId] [bigint] NOT NULL, [IsEnabled] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DrillThroughQueryReportCell] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimensionName] ASC, [MeasureName] ASC, [ActionTypeCode] ASC, [DrillThroughQueryId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] '
exec (@vchSQL)
